mapper.select: Select BRANCHOFFICE_NO, BRANCHOFFICE_NAME, BRANCHOFFICE_LOCAL, BRANCHOFFICE_MOBILE, BRANCHOFFICE_ADDRESS, BRANCHOFFICE_REGDATE, BRANCHOFFICE_DELSIGN From BRANCHOFFICE_TB
SELECT BRANCHOFFICE_IMG__NO, BRANCHOFFICE_NO, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CREA_DTM, DEL_GB FROM BRANCHOFFICE_IMG_TB
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BRANCHOFFICE_IMG_TB( branchoffice_img__no, branchoffice_no, original_file_name, stored_file_name, file_size ) VALUES( 'BROFIMG'||BRANCHOFFICE_IMG_TB_SEQ.nextval, #{after_key, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String}, #{original_file_name, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String}, #{stored_file_name, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String}, #{file_size, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC, javaType=java.lang.Long} )
